home.h2: This project is supported by the federal Foreign Office of German

join_the_community.text: This project is created with the aim of uniting young activists

stories_text: Personal stories of activists about the role of minority youth in society. 11 stories about themselves, about their significance and contribution to society. The participants introduced their company to government bodies, the media, international organizations and other NGOs in Moldova and Germany. This increased awareness of minority youth issues among government agencies and the general public.
